AcceptVpcPeerConnection.title: AcceptVpcPeerConnection
AcceptVpcPeerConnection.summary: Accepts a virtual private cloud (VPC) peering connection request.

DeleteVpcPeerConnection.title: DeleteVpcPeerConnection
DeleteVpcPeerConnection.summary: Deletes a virtual private cloud (VPC) peering connection.

GetVpcPeerConnectionAttribute.title: GetVpcPeerConnectionAttribute
GetVpcPeerConnectionAttribute.summary: Queries the details of a virtual private cloud (VPC) peering connection.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries tags that are added to Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) peering connections.

ListVpcPeerConnections.title: ListVpcPeerConnections
ListVpcPeerConnections.summary: Queries virtual private cloud (VPC) peering connections.

ModifyVpcPeerConnection.title: ModifyVpcPeerConnection
ModifyVpcPeerConnection.summary: Modifies the description or name of a virtual private cloud (VPC) peering connection.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Moves a Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) peering connection from one resource group to another.

RejectVpcPeerConnection.title: RejectVpcPeerConnection
RejectVpcPeerConnection.summary: Rejects a virtual private cloud (VPC) peering connection request.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates tags and adds them to a virtual private cloud (VPC) peering connection.

UnTagResources.title: UnTagResources
UnTagResources.summary: Removes tags from specified Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) peering connections.
